topic.title: NewEnglandCoin (NENG)
topic.body:
Nengcoin (formerly NewEnglandcoin) is a carbon of Bitcoin application scrypt as a proof-of-work algorithm with added appearance to assure adjoin 51% advance and decentralize on mining to acquiesce adapted mining rigs beyond CPUs, GPUs, ASICs and Android phones.

Find More Info...
